content: कामम् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} According to wish or inclination, at will; कामंगामी. {@--2@} Agreeably to desire; <ls>Mu. 1. 25.</ls> {@--3@} To the heart's content; <ls>U. 3. 16.</ls> {@--4@} Willingly, joyfully; <ls>Śānti. 4. 4.</ls> {@--5@} Well, very well (a particle of assent), it may be that; मनागनभ्यावृत्त्या वा कामं क्षाम्यतु यः क्षमी <ls>Śi. 2. 43.</ls> {@--6@} Granted or admitted (that), true that, no doubt, (generally followed by तु, तथापि, yet, still); कामं न तिष्ठति मदाननसंमुखी सा भूयिष्ठमन्यविषया न तु दृष्टिरस्याः <ls>Ś. 1. 31</ls>; <ls n="Ś.">2. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 13</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 22</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 75</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 34.</ls> {@--7@} Indeed, forsooth, really; <ls>R. 2. 43</ls>; (often implying unwillingness or contradiction). {@--8@} Better, rather (usually with न); काममामरणात्तिष्ठेद् गृहे कन्यर्तुमत्यपि . न चैवैनां प्रयच्छेत्तु गुणहीनाय कर्हिचित् <ls>Ms. 9. 89</ls>; <ls>H. 1. 131.</ls>
